msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; some numbers of drachmas and obols are written on the Verso.
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides, but not at the top and the bottom. 2 kolleses at the beginning of the column, and in the middle of col. 96. There is a big lacuna on the left hand side of col. 95, as well as some small ones as the result of a fold; There are several lacunae in col. 96. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer The scribe wrote some numbers of drachmas and obols, presumably as a draft. (MA)
